neighbors.name: Richard A. Jasinski
neighbors.claims: Richard A. Jasinski is the recorded owner of tax parcel 16.-1-23 in Genesee County ([Hecate Energy](http://cidersolarfarm.com/assets/pdfs/public_exhibits/Exh_04.pdf)). The property is identified in real property documents associated with the Cider Solar Farm (a 500 MW facility in Elba/Oakfield), rather than the Byron-based project mentioned in the draft ([Hecate Energy](http://cidersolarfarm.com/assets/pdfs/public_exhibits/Exh_04.pdf)). Public records do not indicate active civic leadership roles or documented positions on local solar development.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowner; no evidence of public office.

approach_recommendations.engage: Verify his relationship to the property (residence vs. land holding) and clarify the specific project context (Cider Solar vs. Excelsior) affecting his parcel. Focus on land use compatibility.

citations.claim: Richard A. Jasinski is the recorded owner of tax parcel 16.-1-23 in Genesee County.
citations.title: Cider Solar Farm Exhibit 4: Real Property

citations.claim: The property is identified in real property documents associated with the Cider Solar Farm.
citations.title: Cider Solar Farm Exhibit 4: Real Property

neighbors.verification_notes: Draft name 'Brett Jasinski' could not be verified as the owner of PIN 16.-1-23; project documents consistently list 'Richard A. Jasinski'. Updated name to match public record. Draft reference to 'Town of Byron' and '280 MW project' (Excelsior) appears incorrect for this PIN, which maps to the Cider Solar project context in Elba/Oakfield.

neighbors.name: Makayla Friedl
neighbors.claims: Makayla Friedl is the owner of parcel 12.-1-6.2 in the Town of Oakfield, Genesee County, comprising approximately 1.97 acres ([Genesee County](https://www.geneseeny.gov/files/content/county/v/12/department-content/planning/agricultural-and-farmland-protection/2025-03-18-meeting-packet.pdf)). The property was listed in a 2025 county review regarding modifications to Agricultural District No. 2 ([Genesee County](https://www.geneseeny.gov/files/content/county/v/12/department-content/planning/agricultural-and-farmland-protection/2025-03-18-meeting-packet.pdf)). No public statements regarding solar development have been found.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private citizen; no public leadership roles found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with general community updates. Since her property was involved in agricultural district reviews (listed for removal/modification), she may be attentive to land classification changes. Keep outreach informative.

citations.claim: Makayla Friedl is the owner of parcel 12.-1-6.2 in the Town of Oakfield, Genesee County.
citations.title: Genesee County Agricultural District No. 2 Review Packet

citations.claim: The property was listed in a 2025 county review regarding modifications to Agricultural District No. 2.
citations.title: Genesee County Agricultural District No. 2 Review Packet

neighbors.verification_notes: Verified ownership and location via Genesee County planning documents. Confirmed lack of public stance records.

neighbors.name: Scott M. Mabon
neighbors.claims: Scott M. Mabon owns parcel 12.-1-6.12 (3.10 acres) and Scott Andrew Mabon owns parcel 12.-1-27.11 (0.38 acres) in the Town of Oakfield, Genesee County ([Genesee County](https://www.geneseeny.gov/files/content/county/v/12/department-content/planning/agricultural-and-farmland-protection/2025-03-18-meeting-packet.pdf)). These properties are situated within the county's Agricultural District No. 2 ([Genesee County](https://www.geneseeny.gov/files/content/county/v/12/department-content/planning/agricultural-and-farmland-protection/2025-03-18-meeting-packet.pdf)). No record of civic leadership or public stance on renewable energy projects was found.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowner; no evidence of public office.

approach_recommendations.engage: Utilize a one-on-one approach. Given his ownership of parcels within the Agricultural District, focus on how the project plans address rural character and agricultural preservation.

citations.claim: Scott M. Mabon owns parcel 12.-1-6.12 (3.10 acres) and Scott Andrew Mabon owns parcel 12.-1-27.11 (0.38 acres) in the Town of Oakfield.
citations.title: Genesee County Agricultural District No. 2 Review Packet

citations.claim: These properties are situated within the county's Agricultural District No. 2.
citations.title: Genesee County Agricultural District No. 2 Review Packet

neighbors.verification_notes: Verified name as Scott M. Mabon (and Scott Andrew Mabon) via county tax rolls in planning documents.
